definition: to take it up a notch/to bring it up a level
more/even more/further/still/still more
to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
layer/stratum/laminated/floor (of a building)/storey/classifier for layers/repeated/sheaf (math.)
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
surname Lou

sentences.english: We should make the quality of our products even better.
sentences.chinese: 我們要使產品質量更上一層樓。

sentences.english: I look forward to working with you to take the China-UK relationship to a new high.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們共同努力，推動中英關係更上一層樓。

sentences.english: The STTA wishes Coach Liu well in his future coaching career.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡乒總祝賀劉教練的事業更上一層樓。

sentences.english: This is how they use conflict as a catapult to high performance.
sentences.chinese: 這樣利用衝突，他們就能讓自己的表現更上一層樓。

sentences.english: Finally, I wish my center career more hope that early today. Return.
sentences.chinese: 最後，祝我中心的事業更上一層樓，懇盼早回佳音。

sentences.english: First I'd like to wish King World Hotel a more successful new year.
sentences.chinese: 首先預祝君豪大飯店在新的一年裏更上一層樓。

sentences.english: A camera supplies the data for colour sorting.
sentences.chinese: 柯尼卡膠捲使彩色攝影更上一層樓。

sentences.english: Exhausting my eyes to a thousand li further, I am ascending one more story of the tower.
sentences.chinese: 欲窮千里目，更上一層樓。

sentences.english: Konica film takes color photography to new heights.
sentences.chinese: 柯尼卡膠捲使彩色攝影更上一層樓。

sentences.english: As a result, the Sino-French cooperation in cultural exchanges will see a better day to come.
sentences.chinese: 中法合作將因文化交流而更上一層樓。

sentences.english: For a grander sight, the true meaning of a higher level.
sentences.chinese: 欲窮千里目，更上一層樓的真正含義。

definition: next year/the coming year
to hope/to expect/expectation(s)
to prepare/to make adequate preparation
to continue the struggle (idiom); to persist/unremitting efforts
to repay a favor/to give back/feedback
to increase steadily/to grow with each passing day
with great prospects for the future (idiom); well worth doing
to found/to create
a good chance/a golden opportunity
profitable to both sides/a win-win situation
hand in hand/to join hands/to collaborate
fair competition
to achieve/to implement/to realize/to bring about
to march/to advance
to display/to exhibit/to bring out implicit or innate qualities/to express (a thought or moral)/to develop (an idea)/to elaborate (on a theme)
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
